title: WTB: T206 Johnson, Young or Mathewson

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Johnson, Young or Mathewson
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave
I am looking to buy a Johnson, Young, or Mathewson portrait T206 in fair to good condition and would like to keep the price aroung $300.  I am also looking for the other Mathewson cards in the same condition but would like to keep the price around $150.  Please email me if you have any to sell.  Thanks
